amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funding from being made available for the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service's final rule titled "Endangered and Threatened Wildlife and Plants; Endangered Species Status With Critical Habitat for Guadalupe Fatmucket, Texas Fatmucket, Guadalupe Orb, Texas Pimpleback, Balcones Spike, and False Spike, and Threatened Species Status With Section 4(d) Rule and Critical Habitat for Texas Fawnsfoot".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
